$supersonic.home.title: This is your session
$supersonic.hello.title: Hello world
$supersonic.hello.content:
If you see a green greeting messages, the connection to the database is working.
The greetings are retrieved from the greetings table.
If the text says LOADING, something does not work.
$supersonic.whoami.title: Who Am I
$supersonic.whoami.content: These are the identity and role information of the authenticated identity.
